body:
Those absolute paths are in temporary directories, the names of which change from run to run. We run the actual build in the package directory. I mean, I guess we could say ../../../../../../../$WORK/_/home/.../misc/cgo/life/_obj/_cgo_main.c instead of $WORK/_/home/.../misc/cgo/life/_obj/_cgo_main.c, but does that really make sense?

If ccache works with the ../../../../ but not without, that seems like a bug in ccache.
